'''1.14.60''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on April 15, 2020, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360041875292|title=Minecraft - 1.14.60 (Bedrock)|date=April 15, 2020}}</ref> It is the last version of Minecraft to support iOS 8.

==Additions==
===General===
[[File:Bedrock online disclaimer.png|thumb|The disclaimer that appears before loading a world.]]
'''[[World]]s'''
* Added a legal disclaimer before loading a world: a new information screen informs the player that "Online play is not rated".

==Changes==
===General===
* The ability to transfer worlds from [[PlayStation 3 Edition]] and [[PlayStation Vita Edition]] to the [[PlayStation 4 Edition|Legacy Console version of the PlayStation 4]] has been removed.

== Fixes ==
'''Crashes'''
* Fixed an issue that could cause Minecraft not to launch past the loading screen after updating ({{bug|MCPE-58897}}).
* Fixed a crash that could occur when exiting a world.
* Fixed a crash that could occur when a split-screen player left the game.
* Fixed a crash that could occur during gameplay on Nintendo Switch.

'''General'''
* Fixed an issue that showed a false prompt that a device was out of storage space ({{bug|MCPE-32501}}).
* Fixed an issue with the Marketplace not loading when not signed into a Microsoft account.
* Fixed issues with content not transferring to a Microsoft account if the content was purchased without being signed in.

'''Gameplay'''
* Fixed some special characters not appearing on signs or book & quill.

'''Add-ons'''
* Animation controllers in behavior packs can now run commands on Realms ({{bug|MCPE-59881}}).
